synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: 5-nitroisophthalic acid (250 mg, 1.184 mmol), copper nitrate (276 mg, 1.184 mmol), 2,6-lutidine (254 mg, 2.368 mmol)

synthesis_conditions.time: 24 h heating followed by 3-4 weeks sitting
synthesis_conditions.yield: Approximately 27% (128.3 mg of deep blue precipitate)
synthesis_conditions.notes: XPD confirmed the structure obtained from the single crystal.
